question: Ranjan Roy, who passed away recently, was associated with which field?
explanation: Ranjan Roy (57), the chief of the Times News Network (TNN) and a member of The Times of India\'s national editorial board, has passed away in New Delhi on March 10, 2018. He was known for his professional acumen and personal charm. An alumnus of Delhi’s St. Stephen’s College and Princeton University, US, Roy started his journalistic career in the Press Trust of India (PTI) in New Delhi as a trainee in 1982.
